participant_1.name: Oliver
participant_1.personality: Curious and introspective, enjoys quiet moments and intellectual discussions.
participant_1.background: i'm partly deaf. i grow roses in my garden. i've a big library at home. i am a museum tour guide. i love to drink fancy tea.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Energetic and outgoing, loves sports and spending time outdoors with friends and family.
participant_2.background: my family is continuously growing. i enjoy long walks with my dog. i'm a professional tennis player. i live in a three storey house.

content.text: i tend my rose garden and read books   i m deaf in one ear
oh   okay   i m deaf   do you read
